name: Biswa Ranjan Barik
description: Biswa has mentored 80+ JEE aspirants, helping them secure seats in IITs and NITs, and has successfully guided 24+ students through end-to-end JoSAA counseling. His mentorship focuses on topic-specific strategies, mock test analysis, and exam attempt techniques to maximize scores. With 8+ sessions on exam stress and time management, he ensures students stay focused and motivated throughout their preparation.

name: Shreesh Mahapatra
description: With a strong foundation in Physics and an outstanding research background, Shreesh simplifies complex topics and enhances problem-solving skills for JEE aspirants. His expertise extends beyond academics—he also specializes in stress management techniques, helping students stay focused and confident during their preparation. His mentorship ensures a structured approach to mastering Physics while maintaining a healthy mindset for peak performance.

name: Preetish Behera
description: A State Top-10 Rank Holder in 10th & 12th, Preetish has a deep understanding of Chemistry, helping JEE aspirants master conceptual clarity, problem-solving techniques, and high-scoring strategies. With his expertise, he simplifies complex topics and guides students with topic-specific strategies and exam attempt techniques. His structured mentorship ensures students build strong fundamentals and maximize their JEE scores.

name: Apoorva Rajadhyaksha
description: An NTSE Scholar, KVPY Qualified, and Honorable Mention in the International Math Olympiad, Apoorva has a deep understanding of mathematical problem-solving techniques essential for JEE success. Her structured approach helps students grasp high-yield concepts, and tackle complex problems with confidence. With a proven track record in competitive exams, she ensures students develop strong fundamentals and the right mindset to excel in JEE.

name: Arman Atibudhi
description: With an AIR 947 in JEE Advanced, AIR 157 in KVPY, and NTSE qualification, Arman has mastered competitive exam strategies. He has delivered 5+ Toppers’ Talks, sharing his expertise in topic-wise study techniques, test-taking strategies, time management and competitive programming. His structured approach to mock test analysis and exam attempt strategy helps students maximize their scores and stay ahead in JEE preparation.
